pageContext.claim: “They have a new one [Sen. Kamala Harris] who knocked the hell out of Biden during a debate. He said, 'I wasn't prepared for that question.'”
pageContext.analysis: Sen. Kamala Harris criticized former vice president Joe Biden over his opposition to mandatory busing to integrate public schools in the 1970s. After a back and forth during the debate, Biden noted that his time to respond had run out. He later said he was taken aback by Harris, who had been friends with his late son Beau. But Biden clearly was prepared for attacks on his record on school busing, since he had detailed answers and counterattacks ready to go.
